data.Title: Google Ads to Sunset Enhanced CPC in 2025
data.Description: Google Ads is phasing out Enhanced CPC (ECPC) bidding and will automatically migrate campaigns to Manual CPC in March 2025.

data.Title: Google Business Profile Appointment Link Notifications
data.Description: Google Business Profiles is now sending email notifications to businesses when appointment links on their profiles are broken.

data.Title: Bing May Support ProductGroup Markup
data.Description: Bing may soon start supporting ProductGroup markup, according to Fabrice Canel from Microsoft. While not yet supported, it's on their radar.

data.Title: Bing Handles 308 Redirects Like 301s
data.Description: Bing Search treats 308 redirects the same way as 301 redirects, confirmed by Fabrice Canel from Microsoft. This aligns with Google's stance since 2021.

data.Title: Bing Tests "See Details" Button for Product Listings
data.Description: Bing is experimenting with a prominent blue "see details" button for some product listings in search results. This button expands product information on hover.

data.Title: Mediavine Bans Publisher for Excessive AI Content
data.Description: Mediavine took action against a publisher for overusing AI-generated content. The ad network's Director of Ad Operations cited concerns about low-quality content and its impact on advertising partners.

data.Title: YouTube Studio Introduces Website Visits Goal for Promotions
data.Description: YouTube Studio now offers a "website visits" goal for promotional campaigns. This feature aims to help creators drive traffic from their videos to external websites, enhancing product and service promotion.

data.Title: Microsoft Combats Deepfakes on Bing with StopNCII Partnership
data.Description: Microsoft is collaborating with StopNCII to identify and remove abusive deepfake content and non-consensual intimate images from its Bing search engine.

data.Title: Justice Department's Antitrust Case Against Google's Ad Tech
data.Description: The Justice Department's antitrust lawsuit against Google's ad tech practices is set to begin. The case centers on allegations that Google holds a monopoly in the digital advertising market.
